We host a community space for palaeobiologists using the <a href="https://groups.google.com/g/palaeoverse" style="text-decoration: none">**Google Groups**</a> platform. This space provides an area to share ideas and resources, advertise opportunities, and network with colleagues in an informal setting. Questions related to <a href="./package.qmd" style="text-decoration: none">**palaeoverse packages**</a> are also more than welcome. This space is unmoderated, but please be kind to others. We reserve the right to remove anyone harrasing individuals.
:::
:::

## Twitter

::: columns
::: {.column width="75%"}
::: justify
We are active on <a href="https://twitter.com/ThePalaeoverse" style="text-decoration: none">**Twitter**</a>, where we share updates and news on Palaeoverse, as well as resources for the Palaeobiology community. We are also more than happy to help circulate relevant news you wish to share with the community, just remember to tag <a href="https://twitter.com/ThePalaeoverse" style="text-decoration: none">@ThePalaeoverse</a> and use the hashtag <a href="https://twitter.com/search?q=palaeoverse&src=typed_query" style="text-decoration: none">**#palaeoverse**</a>.
:::
